[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/twolodzko/kernelboot/master.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/twolodzko/kernelboot?branch=master)

This package implements smoothed bootstrap, that is an extension of standard bootstrap procedure,
where instead of drawing samples with replacement from the empirical distribution, they are drawn
from kernel density estimate of the distribution.

Install the GitHub version with

```
devtools::install_github("twolodzko/kernelboot")
```
